blogPost.excerpt: PictureThis® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a “green thumb”! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!
blogPost.body: PictureThis® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a “green thumb”! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!
blogPost.title: PictureThis 2.0 - Instantly identify plants like a botanist in your pocket 🌱
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: PictureThis®每天识别1,000,000多种植物，准确率高达98%，比大多数人类专家都要好。让你的园艺问题得到解答，成为一名“园艺高手”！只需给植物拍张照片，就能为你解答所有问题！
localize.tagline: 立即识别您口袋中的植物，就像植物学家一样🌱

localize.description: PictureThis®每天識別1,000,000多種植物，準確率高達98%，比大多數人類專家都要好。讓你的園藝問題得到解答，成爲一名“園藝高手”！只需給植物拍張照片，就能爲你解答所有問題！
localize.tagline: 立即識別您口袋中的植物，就像植物學家一樣🌱

previous.excerpt: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
previous.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.

localize.description: Niceboard是开始你自己的利基职位板业务的最简单的方式，而不需要编写一行代码。在几分钟内设置您的主板，连接您自己的域，查看实时应用程序统计信息，回填作业，翻译它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 创建一个求职公告板。不需要代码。

localize.description: Niceboard是開始你自己的利基職位板業務的最簡單的方式，而不需要編寫一行代碼。在幾分鐘內設置您的主板，連接您自己的域，查看實時應用程序統計信息，回填作業，翻譯它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 創建一個求職公告板。不需要代碼。
